snippet: A newly rediscovered Picasso work on glass, mistakenly put in storage more than 40 years ago, is being sold by an Indiana museum.
abstract: Evansville Museum of Arts, History and Science in Indiana plans to sell a glass mosaic made by Pablo Picasso that had been mislabeled and was recently rediscovered in its basement.
lead_paragraph: A newly rediscovered Picasso work on glass, mistakenly put in storage more than 40 years ago, is being sold by an Indiana museum.

headline.seo: Forgotten Picasso Is Windfall for Evansville Museum
headline.main: Long-Forgotten Picasso Is a Museum’s Windfall
headline.print_headline: Long-Forgotten Picasso Is a Museum’s Windfall

keywords.value: Evansville Museum of Arts, History and Science
keywords.name: organizations
